forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High around 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this evening. A few showers developing late. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this evening. A few showers developing late. Low 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early with thunderstorms developing in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and thunderstorms. High 57F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers in the evening, then overcast overnight with occasional rain. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers during the evening will give way to steady rain overnight. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning, then sunny in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 43F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.
